definition: to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)

sentences.english: USB is an interface standard of computer's external devices.
sentences.chinese: USB是一種計算機外圍串行通訊接口標準。

sentences.english: Gambling is prohibited outside the enclaves of Hong Kong and Macau.
sentences.chinese: 香港和澳門賽馬的外圍賭馬是被禁止的。

sentences.english: In 1962, China had no military-related presence in our periphery.
sentences.chinese: 1962年，中國在我們外圍沒有軍事存在。

sentences.english: On the ohter hand have you also a compositional relationship between a peripherical device and the computer.
sentences.chinese: 在別人的手你的外圍設備和關係組成。

sentences.english: Much of the outer portion of this huge conglomeration of people and activities is made up of low-rise residential development.
sentences.chinese: 這座大型城市的外圍區域太多爲低層的居民住宅區。

sentences.english: These agents must secure roads and rooftops4 around the stadium.
sentences.chinese: 這些探員必須戒護場地的外圍道路及屋頂。

sentences.english: This atom donates its outer two electron to making the chemical bond.
sentences.chinese: 這個原子提供了其最外圍的兩個電子，以形成化學鍵。

sentences.english: Foreigner remained, in the purest sense, spectators, on the outside looking in.
sentences.chinese: 外國人還是最單純意義上的看客，只能在外圍遠觀。

sentences.english: They also keep outsiders from gaining access to that code.
sentences.chinese: 包裝器也使外圍者不能訪問這些代碼。

sentences.english: We dealt with the peripheral aspects of a cost reduction program .
sentences.chinese: 我們談到了降低成本計劃的一些外圍問題。

sentences.english: Engineers have now connected a power cable to the outside of the plant.
sentences.chinese: 工程師們已經將一根電纜線連到核電站外圍。

sentences.english: Concrete encasement of steel structures used to be a common method of fire protection.
sentences.chinese: 在鋼結構外圍的混凝土常用於防火。

sentences.english: And the outer layer is composed of aragonite tablets.
sentences.chinese: 珍珠的外圍是較厚的霰石晶層。

sentences.english: The artwork always figures into view out, even if only peripherally.
sentences.chinese: 數字藝術作品總是將觀點指出，即使只是外圍。

sentences.english: The smooth outer membrane encloses the periphery of the mitochondria and the inner membrane is enfolded to form the cristae.
sentences.chinese: 光滑的外膜包圍了線粒體膜外圍和內屬於包含形成嵴。

sentences.english: Perching on the periphery of every orchestra is a percussion player.
sentences.chinese: 坐在每支管絃樂隊外圍的是打擊樂演奏者。

definition: to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
to wait and see/to watch from the sidelines/to look around/to survey
to attack/to batter/(of waves) to pound against/shock/impact
